title: Crown The Woman-South Sudan - We will be "Profiling New Peace Leaders" every Wednesday and Friday. We will be sharing amazing stories of young emerging South Sudanese women who are creating a positive change through their peace building initiatives and work: Art, Media, Poetry and Music.  This Friday, join us and learn about the peace works of Diana Joseph: a disabled young woman who is paving way for other women with disabilities-"women with disabilities should be included in decision making processes" AnaTaban  Search for Common Ground Eye Radio Riya Williams Yuyada | Facebook
